parameters.name: H
parameters.comment: Sets the number of hidden units default: 10

parameters.name: E
parameters.comment: Sets the maximum number of epochs default: 1000 (auto_cut_out)

parameters.name: r
parameters.comment: Sets the learning rate (tyically somewhere between 'very small' and 0.1) default: 0.1

parameters.name: m
parameters.comment: Sets the momentum (typically somewhere between 0.1 and 0.9) default: 0.1
